title: Energy Boost - Detox Plans - Flax & Kale
description: This plan with cold-pressed juices packed with minerals and vitamins will give you the energy and that extra boost you need while eliminating all the toxins that nobody needs. Feel clean and strong, do it for three days and notice the difference. Keeppushing!
